diff_hunk:

 {
   HANDLE_TH_ERRORS
   static PythonArgParser parser({
-    "cuda(int64_t? device=-1, bool non_blocking=False)",

+    "cuda(Device? device=None, bool non_blocking=False)",

body: Not a comment to this PR, just curious: what does the `?` after `Device` mean in here? It does have a default value, so I assume it's something more than an optional arg
